description: This is a React Native front-end component implementing a minimalist Tic Tac Toe game with scoring, status indicator, and theming, defined in a single TSX file.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current board state.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React Functional component rendering the entire game interface, including scoreboards, game grid, controls, and status messages.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Resets the game board to an initial empty state while preserving scores.

methods.name: resetScores
methods.description: Resets both players' scores to zero and starts a new game.

methods.name: handlePressCell
methods.description: Handles user interaction when pressing a cell on the board, updates game state accordingly.
